content: get ready to elevate your dishcloth game with the spade shaped cloth crochet pattern this advanced beginner project is perfect for those looking to expand their skills and create a unique and functional piece for their kitchen or their next game night the pattern includes detailed written instructions making it easy to follow along worked flat this cloth is both practical and decorative with the help of the included captioned right and left-handed video tutorials you ll master the granny stitch and create a beautiful cloth in no time decorate with the card suit set for game night casion fundraisers use them as appliques or garlands - get creative and have fun **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn lily sugar n cream solids https //shrsl com/4uc0e worsted weight 40 yards
